titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the High-Church of Edinburgh, at the election of the magistrats of the city. On the 2d. of Octob. 1694. / by James Webster, Minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Webster, James, 1658?-1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Sanders, one of their Majesties printers,

notesStmt.note: List of magistrates elected on final leaf.
Imperfect: stained and tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
